backend/main.mo: Defines player profiles, game modes, structures, crops, and persistent game state with functions to create/update player data and manage game runs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, related source files, components, and test mappings for the Metablocks project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one-line summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with all game mode routes and wraps the app with theme and toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the global layout with header, navigation, coin display, auth status, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Displays sign-in state using Internet Identity with login/logout controls.
frontend/src/components/ModeTile.tsx: Reusable card component showing a game mode tile with icon, description, and optional best score.
frontend/src/components/RequireSignInDia: Dialog prompting users to sign in before accessing features that require authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBattle.ts: Provides battle stats fetching and a mutation to record a win by running a full game lifecycle on the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useCarRacing.ts: Fetches the player’s best racing time and saves new times through game lifecycle calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useCityBuilder.ts: Handles saving and loading simplified city layout data using the backend’s player data API.
frontend/src/hooks/useFarming.ts: Manages saving farm plots, harvesting crops, and loading farm data via player data APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameProgress.ts: Saves generic game progress by running start, update, and end lifecycle calls for any game mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerProfile.ts: Fetches the authenticated player’s profile from the backend with react-query caching.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and global typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, providing query and identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/HubPage.tsx: Displays the main game hub with mode tiles, sign‑in gating, and links to game routes using player profile data.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Renders a tabbed leaderboard UI showing mock ranking data for each game mode.
frontend/src/pages/modes/BattlePage.tsx: Implements a turn-based battle game with player/enemy actions, win tracking, and UI for stats and combat controls.
frontend/src/pages/modes/CarPage.tsx: Provides a racing mini‑game with progress tracking, keyboard car movement, and best‑time saving.
frontend/src/pages/modes/CityBuilderPage: Implements a grid-based city builder where players place structures using coins and save/load city layouts.
Creates an endless runner where the player jumps to avoid obstacles, earning score and coins on game over.
frontend/src/pages/modes/FarmingPage.tsx: Manages a farming grid where players plant, grow, and harvest crops with timers and persistence.
frontend/src/pages/modes/indoor/PuzzleGa: Implements a sliding‑tile 3x3 puzzle minigame with move counting, scoring, and saving progress to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/modes/indoor/Reaction: Implements a reaction‑time minigame with timed rounds, scoring based on click speed, and backend score saving.
frontend/src/pages/modes/IndoorPage.tsx: Acts as a menu switching between reaction and puzzle indoor mini‑games.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, animations, typography, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes overall project state, features, requirements, and image assets for the Metablocks game.
